property.name: Text
property.value: While your Lord Megatron, Conqueror of Cybertron has a Decepticon Upgrade -> He has +1 ATK and +1 DEF. When one of your Decepticons flips from Alt mode to Bot mode -> Each player scraps the top 3 cards of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Aerialbots has Bold 1. When you combine into Superion, Sky Protector -> Flip this. At the end of your turn, if you have 5 Aerialbot characters in Bot Mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area -> You may combine them into Superion, Sky Protector.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Stratagem now applies to your Superion, Sky Protector. The first time you would do non-attack damage to exactly one enemy during your turn -> Instead do that much damage plus 1. At the start of your turn, if your Superion, Sky Protector has at least 30 damage -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 1 extra Star of cards. While your Private Arcee, Special Ops Warrior has an Armor -> She has +1 ATK.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Stunticons has Bold 1. When you combine into Menasor, Menacing Colossus -> Flip this. At the end of your turn, if you have 5 Stunticon characters in Bot Mode on the battlefield and/or in your KO area -> You may combine them into Menasor, Menacing Colossus.

property.name: Text
property.value: This Stratagem now applies to your Menasor, Menacing Colossus. When you play your second Action during your turn -> Repair 1 damage from Menasor, Menacing Colossus. When your Menasor, Menacing Colossus has at least 30 damage -> He becomes Sturdy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your Grapple, Autobot Architect has Bold 1 and Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your deck can have up to 1 extra Star of cards. Your Sergeant Barricade, Infantry Enforcer has Tough 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Autobots only. Tough 1. When you put this on an Aerialbot -> Move 1 damage from the upgraded character to an enemy. Then, repair 1 damage from your Superion, Sky Protector.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put an enemy Upgrade on the bottom of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to one of your characters -> Your opponent reveals their hand and you scrap a card from it that has one or fewer combat icons.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put on Decepticons only. When your Menasor, Menacing Colossus attacks, and you flip at least [O][U] -> Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Pierce 1. When the upgraded character attacks an enemy with 17 Stars or more -> It gets an additional +2 ATK and Pierce 2 this battle.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal -> When one of your characters would take damage from an opponent's card. When Revealed -> That character becomes Sturdy until end of turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: Do 1 damage to one of your characters -> Put an enemy Upgrade on top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting Star limit increases by 1 if you have only Seekers on your starting team. This can't return to the battlefield from your KO area. Revenge -> Add up to one battle card with no battle icons from your scrap pile to your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Brave. This can't return to the battlefield from your KO area. When you flip to this mode -> Do 1 damage to one of your Seekers and 1 damage to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: Stealth against Decepticons. At the start of the game -> Do 1 damage to this. Then, do 1 additional damage to this if you had a Decepticon on your starting team.

property.name: Text
property.value: You may play Master Sword on this character in an empty Weapon slot. When you flip to this mode -> You may do 2 damage to this. If you do, this can attack untapped enemy Decepticons as though they were tapped this turn.

property.name: Text
property.value: When you flip to this mode -> Draw a card. Then, scrap a card from your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the game begins -> Choose a different Stunticon character you own from outside the game that isn't Motormaster, Stunticon Leader. Put it into your KO area in alt mode. Your other Decepticons can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your other Decepticons can't take non-attack damage from your opponent's cards. When one of your Stunticons with 5 Stars or fewer attacks and you flip at least [O][U] -> You may flip that character to another mode.

card.name: Raider Overkill - Spy Patrol - Havoc Wreaker

alternate.name: Raider Overkill - Spy Patrol - Havoc Wreaker

property.name: Text
property.value: Tough 2. Revenge -> Put an enemy Upgrade on the top of its owner's deck.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can't flip to another mode except with his own ability. At the start of your turn, if this is your only character on the battlefield -> Flip this. When this attacks -> Move a damage from one of your Seekers to an enemy.

property.name: Text
property.value: This can't flip to another mode. When this defends -> Do 1 damage to the attacking enemy after the battle. When you flip to this mode -> You may play an Upgrade from your scrap pile.

property.name: Text
property.value: When the game begins -> Choose a different Aerialbot character you own from outside the game that isn't Silverbolt, Aerialbot Leader. Put it into your KO area in alt mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your Aerialbots has Pierce 1. When one of your Aerialbots with 5 Stars or fewer attacks and you flip at least [B][U] -> You may flip that character to another mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Focus 1. When you flip to this mode -> You may scrap a card from your hand. If you do, use the Revenge ability of a Spy Patrol or Mini-Cassette in your KO area.

property.name: Text
property.value: For each different Spy Patrol and/or Mini-Cassette in your KO area -> This has +1 ATK and +1 DEF up to +3 ATK and +3 DEF. When this attacks -> Draw a card. Choose a different Spy Patrol or Mini-Cassette you own from outside the game. Put it into your KO area in either alt or bot mode.

property.name: Text
property.value: Your starting Star limit increases by 1 if you have only Seekers on your starting team. Brave.

property.name: Text
property.value: Each of your other Seekers has Bold 1. Revenge -> You may play an Upgrade from your scrap pile on one of your Planes or Seekers.
